$description:
| What does this do? | Enables Safe Links for Office Applications in the tenant to protect against malicious Office documents. |
| Why should you use this? | Extends protection to documents and emails that contain hyperlinks. |
| What is the end-user impact? | Users may experience a short delay when clicking on URLs in Office documents. |
| Learn more | [Safe links policies](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/security/office-365-security/safe-links-policies-configure?view=o365-worldwide) |
